attributes.additional_details:
European Defense Treaty Organisation (in NATO)

1-British led European Expeditionary Force
2-French led European Expeditionary Force
3-German Led European Expeditionary Force

Each Force will comprise permanently attached structures, create an EU defense council, replace the Commission with Heads of Government, Each group should have a minimum of 300,000, with the leader being in command, but the command structure being multi national. Initially funded by national budgets while collaborating on shared capabilities. Each group, fly EU Flag, National, and a Force unique symbol.

Europe's Nations are feeling smaller, if we work together we can Rise Again...
